this_title: Portrait of a Champion with Roger Federer
introduction: Are you ready to see Roger Federer like you've never seen him before?When the tennis legend met artist Ugo Rondinone, he got the chance to immerse himself in one of his other great life passions — art. Watch the full story of how Federer took to the skies at the Venice Biennale in our original film, “The Making of Cloud Six.”你准备好看到你从未见过的罗杰·费德勒了吗？当这位网球传奇人物遇到艺术家乌戈·朗迪诺内时，他有机会让自己沉浸在他另一个伟大的生活激情中——艺术。让我们看费德勒如何在威尼斯双年展上飞上天空的完整故事，"六朵云的制作 "
foreign_title: Portrait of a Champion with Roger Federer
